product_desc:
Where best to apply my scarce resources, avoid risks and find opportunities? 

“Where best” questions are universal, mission critical, intrinsically spatial, and incredibly complex to answer.    Gartner expects 50 billion connected devices used by 8 billion people in a few years.   Spatial (Location) data is getting faster and more voluminous.    

Where best to collect garbage, dim the lights, or move traffic or deploy staff?  Where best to deploy Cardiologists, discharge patients, store parts, or expand operations?   Every IoT project is filled with “where best” questions.   

Exclusively the realm of data scientists and software architects, Spatial Scores accurately answer “where best” questions.  Maps do not.  

Designed for business people, LocationScore is PlaceLogic’s spatial scoring and search engine.   Accessible via the web or as a web service,  LocationScore answers “where best” questions in just 10 to 30 minutes.
name: PlaceLogic
